content:
Firuzeh
Firuzeh (Persian: فيروزه‎, also Romanized as Fīrūzeh; formerly, Bozghan  (Persian: بزغان‎), also Romanized as Bozghān and Barghān)[2] is a city and capital of Firuzeh County, in Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 4,906, in 1,288 families.[3]  Firuzeh means "turquoise" in Persian.
